text: Arau te'omka bani icharaa'ilara babe raachulasbaraupe (praerana karaiba, te'om ka’ba) ‘niscaya ma'i tomalokara pratipalakara taraphara paraa tomalokara ocarata nidarsana lai ahicho ye, niscaya ma'i tomalokara babe boka matira dbaraa eta caraa'i sadrsa akrti gathana karaima; tara pichata tata ma'i phum dima; phalata allahara adesata se'ito caraa'i hai yaba; lagate ma'i allahara adesata janmandha arau kustha byadhigrastha lokaka niraamaya karaima arau mrtaka jiraita karaima. Tomaloke nijara gharata yi khoraa arau yi sancaya karaa seya'o ma'i tomalokaka jana'i dima. Niscaya iyata tomalokara babe nidarsana ache yadi tomaloke mumina horaa’
